audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - Honorary Degree Convocation: James A. McDivitt and Edward H. White; Dedication Ceremony: Space Research Laboratory ([R193B]) - 1965 June 15

audio_item.dc.abstract: [Program 70] : [Side 1] : [Part 1] : James A. McDivitt and Edward H. White dedication of the Space Research Laboratory shortly after the Gemini 4 flight.
